title: SpriteAnimationConfig
description: A configuration of the sprite animation.

start.title: Start
start.description: The index of the starting frame.

end.title: End
end.description: The index of the ending frame.

loop.title: Loop
loop.description: If loop is set to true, the sprite animation will loop

frameRate.title: Frame rate
frameRate.description: The number of frame per second to use for this animation. That modifies the speed of the animation.
